text: Eileen Marie Davidson (born June 15, 1959) is an American actress, author, television personality and former model. Davidson is best known for her roles in soap operas as Kristen DiMera on NBC's Days of Our Lives, as well as Ashley Abbott on CBS's The Young and the Restless and The Bold and the Beautiful. ==References== Category:1959 births Category:Living people Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:American voice actors Category:American stage actors Category:Writers from Los Angeles Category:Actors from Los Angeles Category:Models from Los Angeles Category:Television personalities from Los Angeles Category:Emmy Award winning actors
title: Eileen Davidson
